#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
long long n;
string s[13]={" ","abc","def","ghi","jkl","mno","pqrs","tuv","wxyz","*"," ","#"};
string x;
int main()
{
    cin>>n;
    while(n--)
    {
        cin>>x;
        int l=x.size();
        int c=0;
        for(int i=0;i<l;i++)
        {
            int y=x[i]-'0';
 
            if(x[i]=='*')
            {
                y=10;
            }
            else if(x[i]=='0')
            {
                y=11;
            }
            else if(x[i]=='#')
            {
                y=12;
            }
 
           if(x[i]!=x[i+1] && (y>1 && y<10))
           {
               cout<<s[y-1][c];
               c=0;
           }
 
            if(y==1 || y==10 || y==11 || y==12)
            {
                cout<<s[y-1][0];
                c=0;
            }
          if(x[i]==x[i+1] && (y>1 && y<10))
           {
              c++;
           }
 
 
 
 
        }
        cout<<endl;
    }
}
